title: $1500 OFF Move-In, Walk-in Closets, Private Storage! Call Now
posting_body: Take a moment to breathe as you step away from the hustle and bustle of downtown into the serene Bay Area city of El Cerrito.
Located in the heart of this electric and centralized neighborhood, you will find Del Norte Place Apartment Homes.
Here we’ve cultivated a community where residents can gather, connect, and have fun with thoughtful amenities tailored to enhance your life.
-Stainless steel appliances including refrigerator and dishwasher

-Resident social lounge with demonstration kitchen                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
-Onsite retail with unique eateries and shopping right at your doorstep

-24-hour fitness center with free weights and cardio machines                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity
-Steps from the El Cerrito del Norte BART Station                                                                                         Featured amenity
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
